title: ASPECT RATIO
body: I have launched my league of legends client just today for the first time in 2 days, and all of a sudden, in game, everything was wide. I think it has something to do with my aspect ratio. my screen is 1920x1080 and is on 16:9. is there anything I could do?

replies.body: I'm playing on a gaming pc, on a monitor.
Logged in for the same reason. Out of curiosity are you guys playing on an actual computer monitor or one of those tv hybrid things?

Hey, I'm on 2560x1440 here, and I have the same issue. It's absolute fuckery. 
I can't play like this. It not only looks awful, but the muscle memory is real... and I just misclick everywhere.
I become exhausted playing one game due to my mouse just not doing what I'm used to.
It's all so gosh dang PHAT.

What the hell did you put in this patch RIOT?

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
